DOC.brief_summary: This study examine whether fast non-fasting lipid measure provide similar clinical information order guide lipid management primary physician . It compare fast vs. non-fasting lipid measurement patient without diabetes .
DOC.brief_title: Assessment Non-Fasting vs. Fasting Lipid Measures Diabetes Patients
DOC.criteria: Park Nicollet Health Services patient due routine lipid measure Unwilling unable provide consent
